channel.title: Everytime i open a client, it closes
channel.description: i try to run ANY client, and it will start runnign fine. i log in, 2-30 seconds later. the client will suddenly close. i've tried it with any cleiint. help please!

item.title: Everytime i open a client, it closes
item.dc:creator: @Punkzombie Punkzombie
item.description:
@Punkzombie wrote:

that happens with alot of people and it is windows 7… what usually happen is after walking around about 2 clicks the client immediatly closes and if its a 317 server client than i dont think most people (including me) know how to solve it… I think its something with the java download… GL

Read full topic
